verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when he fled) (from Saul, in the cave.) Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2620>takes<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Thee; And in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of Thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> I will <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H1942>destruction<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> by.
I will <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> To <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H1584>accomplishes<s%> [all things] for me.

He will <S%H7971>send<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> me; He <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> him who <S%H9575>tramples<s%> upon me. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> forth His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and His <S%H571>truth.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H9225>lions;<s%> I must <S%H7901>lie<s%> among those who <S%H3857>breathe<s%> <S%H3857>forth<s%> <S%H3857>fire,<s%> [Even] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

They have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H6471>steps;<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3721>bowed<s%> <S%H3721>down;<s%> They <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H7882>pit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; They [themselves] have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> yes, I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises!<s%>
I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And Thy <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>
